projects.title: Backend Quiz API
projects.description: A RESTful API built in Laravel which works in tandem with a React frontend. The application allows users to create, edit, and delete quizzes along with their associated questions and answers. Users can also calculate results based on the userâ€™s responses.
projects.snippet: Laravel API with React frontend for creating and completing quizzes.

projects.title: Book Swap Library
projects.description: As a team of 6 we collaborated using agile methodologies to work with an already existing API to implement a number of features including displaying books, adding new book entries, adding reviews for books and the ability to claim and return books.
projects.snippet: A book-sharing app using an existing API.

projects.title: PHP Blog
projects.description: A PHP app styled with Tailwind CSS to display blog posts from a MySQL database. Includes user authentication, allowing users to add blogs, leave comments, and like/dislike posts. All data is tracked in the database and displayed on the front end.
projects.snippet: PHP/Tailwind blog with user auth, comments, and likes.
